author: gsim
msg: Applied patch from Jim Meyering, submitted on dev list:
* configure.ac: Use $enableval, not $enable_APR in the code
supporting --disable-apr and --enable-apr.  The latter doesn't work.

author: trustin
msg: Fixed issue: DIRMINA-349 (ByteBuffer.getString() has bug,code piece: if( ( get() == 0 ) && ( get() == 0 ) ), in ByteBuffer.java line 982 and line 1105,mina1.0.0)
* Fixed wrong NUL detection in UTF-16 strings

author: matzew
msg: trying a suggested work around for a maven-source-plugin bug
